title: Didn't receive mystery gift
body: It's 1st of october and still i didn't receive my mystery gift for ten years anniversary .. although i own riot kayle and have already received the icon . What should i do ? Thanks in advance

replies.body:
We're assisting players that we've missed gifting through Riot Support, so I recommend reaching out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Let me know if you have any questions.
